verses.verse: And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> out of Judah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3063><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Bethel: <S%H1008><s%> and Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn incense. <S%H6999><s%>

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> in the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O altar, <S%H4196><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> a child <S%H1121><s%> shall be born <S%H3205><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> Josiah <S%H2977><s%> by name; <S%H8034><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> thee shall he offer <S%H2076><s%> <S%H853><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> that burn incense <S%H6999><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, and men's <S%H120><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%> shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee.

And he gave <S%H5414><s%> a sign <S%H4159><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the sign <S%H4159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken; <S%H1696><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be rent, <S%H7167><s%> and the ashes <S%H1880><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are upon <S%H5921><s%> it shall be poured out. <S%H8210><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when king <S%H4428><s%> Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the saying <S%H1697><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had cried <S%H7121><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> that he put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Lay hold <S%H8610><s%> on him. And his hand, <S%H3027><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he put forth <S%H7971><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, dried up, <S%H3001><s%> so that he could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> pull it in again <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> him.

The altar <S%H4196><s%> also was rent, <S%H7167><s%> and the ashes <S%H1880><s%> poured out <S%H8210><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> according to the sign <S%H4159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> Entreat <S%H2470><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> <S%H853><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> me, that my hand <S%H3027><s%> may be restored me again. <S%H7725><s%> <S%H413><s%> And the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> besought <S%H2470><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3068><s%> and the king's <S%H4428><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> was restored him again, <S%H7725><s%> <S%H413><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> as it was before. <S%H7223><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me, and refresh <S%H5582><s%> thyself, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> thee a reward. <S%H4991><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> If <S%H518><s%> thou wilt give <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H853><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> thine house, <S%H1004><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee, neither <S%H3808><s%> will I eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> was it charged <S%H6680><s%> me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> turn again <S%H7725><s%> by the same way <S%H1870><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou camest. <S%H1980><s%>

So he went <S%H1980><s%> another <S%H312><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Bethel. <S%H1008><s%>

Now there dwelt <S%H3427><s%> an old <S%H259><s%> <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> in Bethel; <S%H1008><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> him <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> in Bethel: <S%H1008><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> them they told <S%H5608><s%> also to their father. <S%H1><s%>

And their father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, What <S%H335><s%> <S%H2088><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> he? For his sons <S%H1121><s%> had seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> went, <S%H1980><s%> which <S%H834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from Judah. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3063><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> Saddle <S%H2280><s%> me the ass. <S%H2543><s%> So they saddled <S%H2280><s%> him the ass: <S%H2543><s%> and he rode <S%H7392><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%>

And went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> him sitting <S%H3427><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> an oak: <S%H424><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Art thou <S%H859><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> that <S%H834><s%> camest <S%H935><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Judah? <S%H3063><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am.
Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Come <S%H1980><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me, and eat <S%H398><s%> bread. <S%H3899><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I may <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee, nor go in <S%H935><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee: neither <S%H3808><s%> will I eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee in this <S%H2088><s%> place: <S%H4725><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it was said <S%H1697><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> turn again <S%H7725><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou camest. <S%H1980><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> unto him, I <S%H589><s%> am a prophet <S%H5030><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> as thou art; and an angel <S%H4397><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Bring him back <S%H7725><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee into <S%H413><s%> thine house, <S%H1004><s%> that he may eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%> But he lied <S%H3584><s%> unto him.
So he went back <S%H7725><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him, and did eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and drank <S%H8354><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as they <S%H1992><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that <S%H834><s%> brought him back: <S%H7725><s%>

And he cried <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> that <S%H834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Forasmuch <S%H3282><s%> <S%H3588><s%> as thou hast disobeyed <S%H4784><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and hast not <S%H3808><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee,

But camest back, <S%H7725><s%> and hast eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and drunk <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in the place, <S%H4725><s%> of the which <S%H834><s%> the LORD did say <S%H1696><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee, Eat <S%H398><s%> no <S%H408><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> no <S%H408><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%> thy carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the sepulcher <S%H6913><s%> of thy fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he had eaten <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> he had drunk, <S%H8354><s%> that he saddled <S%H2280><s%> for him the ass, <S%H2543><s%> to wit, for the prophet <S%H5030><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he had brought back. <S%H7725><s%>

And when he was gone, <S%H1980><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> met <S%H4672><s%> him by the way, <S%H1870><s%> and slew <S%H4191><s%> him: and his carcass <S%H5038><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the ass <S%H2543><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> it, the lion <S%H738><s%> also stood <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the carcass. <S%H5038><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> men <S%H376><s%> passed by, <S%H5674><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the carcass: <S%H5038><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H1696><s%> it in the city <S%H5892><s%> where <S%H834><s%> the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> dwelt. <S%H3427><s%>

And when the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that <S%H834><s%> brought him back <S%H7725><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof, he said, <S%H559><s%> It <S%H1931><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was disobedient <S%H4784><s%> unto <S%H853><s%> the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> him unto the lion, <S%H738><s%> which hath torn <S%H7665><s%> him, and slain <S%H4191><s%> him, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto him.
And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Saddle <S%H2280><s%> me <S%H853><s%> the ass. <S%H2543><s%> And they saddled <S%H2280><s%> him.

And he went <S%H1980><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H853><s%> his carcass <S%H5038><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and the ass <S%H2543><s%> and the lion <S%H738><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> by <S%H681><s%> the carcass: <S%H5038><s%> the lion <S%H738><s%> had not <S%H3808><s%> eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the carcass, <S%H5038><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> torn <S%H7665><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ass. <S%H2543><s%>

And the prophet <S%H5030><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the carcass <S%H5038><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and laid <S%H5117><s%> it upon <S%H413><s%> the ass, <S%H2543><s%> and brought it back: <S%H7725><s%> and the old <S%H2205><s%> prophet <S%H5030><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> to mourn <S%H5594><s%> and to bury <S%H6912><s%> him.

And he laid <S%H5117><s%> <S%H853><s%> his carcass <S%H5038><s%> in his own grave; <S%H6913><s%> and they mourned <S%H5594><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> him, saying, Alas, <S%H1945><s%> my brother! <S%H251><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he had buried <S%H6912><s%> him, that he spoke <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When I am dead, <S%H4191><s%> then bury <S%H6912><s%> me in the sepulcher <S%H6913><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is buried; <S%H6912><s%> lay <S%H5117><s%> <S%H853><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> his bones: <S%H6106><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the saying <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he cried <S%H7121><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> in Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> shall surely come to pass. <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1961><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> Jeroboam <S%H3379><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> from his evil way, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H7451><s%> but made <S%H6213><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> of the lowest <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7098><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places: <S%H1116><s%> whosoever would, <S%H2655><s%> he consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> him, and he became <S%H1961><s%> one of the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the high places. <S%H1116><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> sin <S%H2403><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeroboam, <S%H3379><s%> even to cut it off, <S%H3582><s%> and to destroy <S%H8045><s%> it from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
